plot: Just as the kids find themselves individually powerless, along comes a lone man, knowledgeable, upset and aiming to end their witchcraft by killing one of them, and he doesn't care who.

A cute athlete named Luke asks Cassie to the school dance, and after watching Adam spend time with Diana at the boathouse, she accepts his offer. Meanwhile, Melissa sees the dance as an opportunity to get closer to Nick. Faye, on the other hand, has no plans to go and remains focused on finding a way to regain her individual powers. Dawn discovers someone from their past: an intense man named Zachary Larson is in town asking questions about Cassie and the Circle, so she asks Charles to keep an eye on him.—CW Publicity
